name: Shining City
description:
This is a casual game for city sightseeing.

Players
Virtual property
You can put your own contents (store/product/picture/model/works) into this game so you can showcase your product and yourself.
This requires you to purchase a virtual property, and you need to agree that other developers can use these to appear in other derivative games.
--- Please buy gems in my Patreon and pick property. ---
--- Add content by updating the game. ---
--- Please read the notice to find out more. ---

Developers
At the same time, this is also a game resource for UnrealEngine 4,
You can use it for your own game, it's free and doesn't require authorization.
